GitHubApiData.name: core
GitHubApiData.description: Your unified, shareable memory layer for AI apps. Compatible with Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, AWS's Kiro, VSCode, Cline

TranslatedDescriptions.zh-CN: 为 AI 应用提供统一且可共享的记忆层。兼容 Cursor、Claude Desktop、Claude Code、Gemini CLI、Windsurf、AWS 的 Kiro、VSCode、Cline。
TranslatedDescriptions.ja: AIアプリ向けの統合型・共有可能なメモリレイヤー。Cursor、Claude Desktop、Claude Code、Gemini CLI、Windsurf、AWSのKiro、VSCode、Clineと互換性あり。
TranslatedDescriptions.zh-TW: 為 AI 應用程式提供統一且可分享的記憶層。兼容 Cursor、Claude Desktop、Claude Code、Gemini CLI、Windsurf、AWS 的 Kiro、VSCode、Cline。
TranslatedDescriptions.ko: AI 앱을 위한 통합 공유 메모리 레이어입니다. Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, AWS의 Kiro, VSCode, Cline과 호환됩니다.
TranslatedDescriptions.hi: AI ऐप्स के लिए आपकी एकीकृत, साझा की जा सकने वाली मेमोरी लेयर। Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, AWS का Kiro, VSCode, और Cline के साथ संगत।
TranslatedDescriptions.th: เลเยอร์หน่วยความจำแบบรวมศูนย์และแชร์ได้สำหรับแอป AI ของคุณ รองรับการใช้งานกับ Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, AWS's Kiro, VSCode, Cline
TranslatedDescriptions.en: Your unified, shareable memory layer for AI apps. Compatible with Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, AWS's Kiro, VSCode, Cline.
TranslatedDescriptions.fr: Votre couche mémoire unifiée et partageable pour les applications d’IA. Compatible avec Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, Kiro d’AWS, VSCode, Cline.
TranslatedDescriptions.de: Ihre einheitliche, gemeinsam nutzbare Gedächtnisschicht für KI-Anwendungen. Kompatibel mit Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, AWS Kiro, VSCode, Cline.
TranslatedDescriptions.es: Tu capa de memoria unificada y compartible para aplicaciones de IA. Compatible con Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, Kiro de AWS, VSCode y Cline.
TranslatedDescriptions.it: Il tuo livello di memoria unificato e condivisibile per applicazioni AI. Compatibile con Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, Kiro di AWS, VSCode, Cline.
TranslatedDescriptions.ru: Ваш единый, совместно используемый слой памяти для AI-приложений. Совместим с Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, AWS Kiro, VSCode, Cline.
TranslatedDescriptions.pt: Sua camada de memória unificada e compartilhável para aplicativos de IA. Compatível com Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, Kiro da AWS, VSCode, Cline.
TranslatedDescriptions.nl: Je verenigde, deelbare geheugenlaag voor AI-apps. Compatibel met Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, AWS's Kiro, VSCode, Cline
TranslatedDescriptions.pl: Twoja zunifikowana, współdzielona warstwa pamięci dla aplikacji AI. Kompatybilna z Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, AWS Kiro, VSCode, Cline.
TranslatedDescriptions.ar: طبقة الذاكرة الموحدة والقابلة للمشاركة لتطبيقات الذكاء الاصطناعي. متوافقة مع Cursor، Claude Desktop، Claude Code، Gemini CLI، Windsurf، Kiro من AWS، VSCode، وCline.
TranslatedDescriptions.fa: لایه حافظه یکپارچه و قابل اشتراک‌گذاری برای برنامه‌های هوش مصنوعی شما. سازگار با Cursor، Claude Desktop، Claude Code، Gemini CLI، Windsurf، Kiro از AWS، VSCode و Cline
TranslatedDescriptions.tr: AI uygulamalarınız için birleşik, paylaşılabilir hafıza katmanı. Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, AWS Kiro, VSCode, Cline ile uyumlu.
TranslatedDescriptions.vi: Lớp bộ nhớ hợp nhất, có thể chia sẻ cho các ứng dụng AI của bạn. Tương thích với Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, Kiro của AWS, VSCode, Cline.
TranslatedDescriptions.as: AI এপ্‌সমূহৰ বাবে আপোনাৰ একত্ৰিত, ভাগ-বতৰা কৰিব পৰা মেম'ৰি স্তৰ। Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, AWS's Kiro, VSCode, আৰু Clineৰ সৈতে সঙ্গতিপূৰ্ণ।
TranslatedDescriptions.id: Lapisan memori terpadu dan dapat dibagikan untuk aplikasi AI Anda. Kompatibel dengan Cursor, Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Windsurf, Kiro dari AWS, VSCode, Cline
